title: Surreal Ambient Soundscapes Vol. 1
description: A collection of surreal ambient soundscapes, perfect for creating an abstract, mystical and oblivious atmosphere for your Fantasy, Post-Apocalyptic or Space gaming genre, containing seamless loops, non-looping soundscapes and one-shot sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/surreal-ambient-soundscapes-vol-1

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ptao1zy62cr0icp/MSE%20-%20Surreal%20Ambient%20Soundscapes%20Vol.%201.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 27 themes and 108 surreal ambient sound effects. 

Each theme includes 4 sound effects independent of each other - a regular version of the soundscape, a loop version of the soundscape and 2 one-shot sounds. All 4 sounds of each theme are separately created sound effects, and there are 108 sounds in total.


Including:

  • 27 seamless loop soundscapes - sound effects lasting just over a minute.
  • 27 non-looping soundscapes - sound effects lasting about one and a half minutes.
  • 54 one-shot sounds - single sound effects that can be used for game events, impacts, tension build-ups, transitions.


These ambient soundscapes work great as a background, they will help you tell a story, increase tension, fill the atmosphere in game scenes. They can also be used for the background in the menu.


Use this asset to create an ethereal and fantasy atmosphere in your locations and worlds, be it a strange alien place, an uncharted planet, an eternal infinity, an inexhaustible life, an endless maze with lost souls or a forgotten place.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  108 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 27 soundscapes of the regular version
  • 27 soundscapes of the looped version
  • 54 one-shot sound effects
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, space, horror, post-apocalyptic, science fiction and more


Number of Audio Waves: 108

Number of Audio Cues: 108

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Some sound effects are set to loop

Minutes of audio provided: 83 minutes 17 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
